MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH27 postcode area of Kirknewton, affecting properties in Haggs Farm and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:54am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:42AM on Friday 23 April 2021.
